attacks.name: Tropical Head
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dragon Hammer
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Tower-Go-Round-GX
attacks.effect: Move any number of Energy from your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
